snippet: The loss of public sector jobs has been greater in the first three years of the Obama administration than even under Ronald Reagan.
abstract: The loss of public sector jobs has been greater in the first three years of the Obama administration than even under Ronald Reagan.
lead_paragraph: When Barack Obama ran for president four years ago, he appalled some Democrats by saying Ronald Reagan had been a transformational president.

headline.main: Under Obama, a Record Decline in Government Jobs
